thread.title: Here’s every Los Angeles area theater showing ‘Back to the Future’ Trilogy this week
thread.title_full: Here’s every Los Angeles area theater showing ‘Back to the Future’ Trilogy this week

author: Samantha Valtierra Bush
title: Here’s every Los Angeles area theater showing ‘Back to the Future’ Trilogy this week
text:
Courtesy of Universal
We made it to the future. That’s right, Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015 is the day that Marty McFly time travels in “Back to the Future Part II”. This year is also the 30th anniversary of the release of Part I.
There’s only one way to celebrate an occasion as monumental as this; By watching all the “Back to the Future” movies, in a row, on the big screen.
So lace up your Nikes, hop in your DeLorean and get to one of these trilogy screenings.
Here’s a complete list of every Los Angeles-area movie theater showing “Back to the Future” movies this week.
AMC Theaters
Aproximately 290 of AMC’s 350 US theaters are showing the complete “Back to the Future” trilogy on Wednesday, Oct 21.
The screenings will start at 4:29 p.m., the exact time Marty McFly travels to the future in Part II.
Here are the AMC theaters showing the trilogy:
• AMC Burbank 16, 125 E Palm Ave, Burbank, CA 91502
• AMC Century City 15, 10250 Santa Monica Boulevard #2000, Los Angeles, CA 90067
• AMC Universal CityWalk 19, 100 Universal City Plaza, Universal City, CA 91608
• AMC Covina 17, 1414 N Azusa Ave, Covina, CA 91722
• AMC Del Amo 18, Spc 73, 3525 W Carson St, Torrance, CA 90503
• AMC Downtown Disney 12, 1565 Disneyland Dr., Anaheim, CA 92802
• AMC Fullerton 20, 1001 S Lemon St, Fullerton, CA 92832
• AMC South Bay Galleria 16, 1815 Hawthorne Blvd #368, Redondo Beach, CA 90278
• AMC Glendora 12, 1337 East Gladstone St., Glendora, CA 91740
• AMC Montebello 10, 475 N Montebello Blvd, Montebello, CA 90640
• AMC Norwalk 20, E., 12300 Civic Center Dr, Norwalk, CA 90650
• AMC Ontario Mills 30, 4549 Mills Circle, Ontario, CA 91764
• AMC Promenade 16, 21801 Oxnard St, Woodland Hills, CA 91367
• AMC Puente Hills 20, 1560 S Azusa Ave, City of Industry, CA 91748
• AMC Rolling Hills 20, 2591 Airport Dr, Torrance, CA 90505
• AMC Santa Anita 16, 400 South Baldwin Avenue, Arcadia, CA 91007
• AMC Santa Monica 7, 1310 3rd St, Santa Monica, CA 90401
• AMC Orange 30 with IMAX, 20 City Blvd West Suite E, Orange, CA 92868-3130
• AMC Tustin 14, 2457 Park Ave, Tustin, CA 92782
• AMC Tyler 16, 3775 Tyler Avenue, Riverside, CA 92503
• AMC Victoria Gardens 12, 12600 N Main St, Rancho Cucamonga, CA 91739
Advertisement
AMC Puente Hills 20 is also showing the full trilogy on Saturday Oct. 17 starting at 5 p.m. The Puente Hills Mall, the shooting location for scenes in “Back to the Future” is also hosting a Back to the Future Fan Appreciation & Time Machine Day on Oct. 18 and has movie memorabilia on display through Oct. 25.
Regal Cinemas
The Regal Cinemas Trilogy screenings will begin at 5 p.m.
• Regal LA LIVE Stadium 14, 1000 W. Olympic Blvd., Los Angeles, CA 90015
• Edwards South Gate Stadium 20 & IMAX, 8630 Garfield Ave, South Gate CA 90280
• UA La Canada 8, 1919 Verdugo Blvd., La Canada, CA 91011
• Regal La Habra Stadium 16, 1351 W. Imperial Highway, La Habra, CA 90631
• Regal Promenade Stadium 13, 550 Deep Valley Drive, Rolling Hills Estates, CA 90274
• Edwards Cerritos Stadium 10, 12761 Towne Center Drive, Cerritos, CA 90701
• Edwards Long Beach Stadium 26 & IMAX, 7501 East Carson Blvd., Long Beach, CA 90808
• Edwards Alhambra Renaissance Stadium 14 & IMAX, 1 East Main St., Alhambra, CA 91801
• Edwards Eastvale Gateway Stadium 14, 12285 Limonite Ave., Eastvale, CA 91752
• Edwards Ontario Mountain Village Stadium 14, 1575 N. Mountain Ave., Ontario, CA 91762
• Edwards Ontario Palace Stadium 22 IMAX & RPX, 4900 E. 4th St., Ontario, CA 91764
• Edwards Anaheim Hills 14, 8032 E. Santa Ana Canyon Road, Anaheim, CA 92808
• Edwards Canyon Country Stadium 10, 18800 Soledad Canyon Road, Canyon Country, CA 91351
• Edwards Valencia Stadium 12 & IMAX, 24435 Town Center Drive, Santa Clarita, CA 91355
• Regal Simi Valley Civic Center Stadium 16 & IMAX, 2751 Tapo Canyon Road, Simi Valley, CA 93063
Cinemark
Back to the Future screenings at Cinemark theaters will begin at 4:29 p.m. Fountain and frozen drinks, hot dogs and Dibs ice cream will be discounted to $2 for the event and large popcorn refills will be free.
• Cinemark North Hollywood, 12827 Victory Blvd.,North Hollywood, CA 91606
• Baldwin Hills Crenshaw Plaza 15 + Xtreme, 4020 Marlton Ave ,Los Angeles, CA 90008
• Cinemark Playa Vista and XD, 12746 W. Jefferson Blvd, Ste. 3190, Playa Vista, CA 90094
• Cinemark Carson & XD, 20700 South Avalon Blvd., Suite 285, Carson, CA 90746
• Cinemark Antelope Valley Mall, 1475 W. Avenue P., Palmdale, CA 93551
• Cinemark Movies 8, 5546 Philadelphia St., In The Chino Promenade Shopping Center, Chino, CA 91710
• Cinemark 22 and IMAX, 2600 W. Ave. I, Lancaster, CA 93536
• Cinemark 16 Victorville and XD, 14470 Bear Valley Rd, Victorville, CA 92392
• Cinemark Jess Ranch, 18935 Bear Valley Road, Apple Valley, CA 92308
Harkins Theatres
Harkins will show just “Back to the Future Part II” at 7 p.m. on Oct. 21.
• Harkins Chino Hills 18, 3070 Chino Ave., Chino Hills, CA 91709
• Harkins Moreno Valley 16, 22350 Town Cir., Moreno Valley, CA 92553
Arclight Cinemas
Arclight’s “Back to the Future Marathon” will begin at 4:29 p.m.
• Arclight Hollywood Cinerama Dome, 6360 Sunset Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90028
• Arclight Beach Cities, 831 S Nash St, El Segundo, CA 90245
• Arclight Culver City, 9500 Culver Blvd, Culver City, CA 90232
• Arclight Pasadena, 300 E Colorado Blvd, Pasadena, CA 91101
• Arclight Sherman Oaks, 15301 Ventura Blvd, Sherman Oaks, CA 91403
TCL Chinese Theater
The “Back to the Future” Trilogy will begin at 4:29 p.m. on Oct. 21.
• TCL Chinese Theater, 6925 Hollywood Blvd, Hollywood, CA 90028
